---
category: news
title: "Ai Weiwei’s Coronation documents the pandemic from its beginnings in Wuhan"
excerpt: "Ai Weiwei’s self-distributed film may be one of the first but it already has the air of a document from another era. Coronation takes us back to Wuhan and to the genesis of the crisis, the strictures of that first lockdown and a time when the concept still seemed alien to the rest of the world."
